talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>
<html>{ui_string:257}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Okay, I think we might be on to something here. I should ask about the Phantom Thief.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
That's a song I just made up! Fun, huh?
Oh, Mr. Phantom Thief~ Mr. Phantom Thief~ Please bring my doll to me~
Don't lose your way~ Don't ever forget~ Please bring my doll to me~
<html>$Ask the Star Lord$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Actually, I also want him to find my doll.</html>
<html>So… Where was it that you lost that doll?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Do you have a wish for Mr. Phantom Thief?
Is that why you are waiting here for him?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… What? They stole a child's doll? (The soldiers must have gotten rowdy...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
I didn't lose it!
That limited edition doll is mine, but the soldiers took it away!
They put it in Lady Hwaran's warehouse!

$Young Girl$
Yes! Pouzzi is my bestest friend.
It's a limited edition and the only doll of its kind in the whole world!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(… A doll? It doesn't make sense that they'd take it to the <FONT color=#086171>Plentiful Gold Trove</FONT>…)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Those soldiers laughed at me when they said it.
They said they were taking it to Lady Hwaran's Storage! They were so mean!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(It couldn't be the Plentiful Gold Trove. Storage… Could it be the <FONT color=#086171>Silver Treasure Vault</FONT>?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
But then the man possessing the Power of the Star Lord said he would go get it back!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Anyway, I better head to the <FONT color=#086171>Silver Treasure Vault</FONT> for now.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Oh, Mr. Phantom Thief~ Mr. Phantom Thief~ Please bring my doll to me~
Don't lose your way~ Don't ever forget~ Please bring my doll to me~

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(It wouldn't hurt to take a quick look inside, would it?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Oh, Mr. Phantom Thief~ Mr. Phantom Thief~ Please bring my doll to me~
Don't lose your way~ Don't ever forget~ Please bring my doll to me~
※ If you continue the mission, you will automatically go to the Silver Treasure Vault.

${user_nick}$
Oh, right. I can only go in alone.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(It wouldn't hurt to take a quick look inside, would it?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Oh, Mr. Phantom Thief~ Mr. Phantom Thief~ Please bring my doll to me~
Don't lose your way~ Don't ever forget~ Please bring my doll to me~
※ If you continue the mission, you will automatically go to the Silver Treasure Vault.

${user_nick}$
Oh, right. I can only go in alone.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
... Oh?! Who might you be?

$Mercenary Vandar$
Got you, impostor!

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Haha… Oh my… Oh my!
(Suddenly, the impostor is smiling brightly...?)

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Really! Really! My goodness! Look who it is! I can't believe this!
If it isn't the Star of Pymon's Mercenaries! The Blade of the Winds! The Gentleman of the Monolith!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Seriously... What the heck is he going on about...?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
(Looks perplexed.)
... What are you talking about…?

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Ahahaha, you really are handsome!
I love it! So fresh! So thrilling! You're as cool as I expected, Vandar!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(This guy… I think... I've seen him before... somewhere...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
Just... who are you...?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Right… That's… exactly the kind of thing... that guy would say…)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
You're speechless! I get it.
It's understandable upon first encountering such cosmic coolness.

$Mercenary Vandar$
What… What's with you?

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Me? Can't you tell?
Call me Transformation Thief Shooting Star★.

$Mercenary Vandar$
But seriously, what's with that face? It's exactly the same as mine! What's your deal!

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Ah, well, you know, I wasn't always this handsome.

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
I was merely a weak cripple before.
All I could do was admire from afar that handsome 'Star of Pymon's Mercenaries,' and his self-made strength.

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
But, one day… the Star☆Lord… the Star Lord bestowed a revelation upon me.
Through the indescribable counterflow of cosmic entropy, the energy of the Shooting Star descended upon me!

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Strength just like you! Soaring power like star★light!
When I opened my eyes and looked in the mirror… there was a new me♥.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Indeed… Why a become a benevolent Phantom Thief? Did the power of the stars inspire you with <FONT color=#a82424>good will</FONT>?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
Whaaat?! But why… Why are you doing all this?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... I think I was wrong to expect a better answer.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Well, I couldn't stand around and do nothing with this power!
Unlike you with your busy schedule, I would work to fulfill the dreams of others!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(… You developed a <FONT color=#a82424>good will</FONT> after becoming strong?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
I am fulfilling the wishes of boys and girls who are weak like I was!
I brought back the father of a boy and
retrieved the stolen doll of a girl!

$Mercenary Vandar$
Well, none of that matters. What am I supposed to do if you get in a fight with soldiers?!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(A good will... Is that something you can develop merely by external influence?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
You truly are humble, Vandar! That shouldn't matter for someone as strong as you.
I am so happy I can be a Phantom Thief thanks to the power bestowed by the Star Lord.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Maybe I should talk to them it in person. It's part of the mission, after all.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
What does being strong have to do with being a Phantom Thief?! Besides, where do you get off going around with my face?!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(It wouldn't hurt to take a quick look inside, would it?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Young Girl$
Oh, Mr. Phantom Thief~ Mr. Phantom Thief~ Please bring my doll to me~
Don't lose your way~ Don't ever forget~ Please bring my doll to
※ If you continue the mission, you will automatically go to the Silver Treasure Vault.

${user_nick}$
Oh, right. I can only go in alone.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>… From what I've seen so far…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Huh? Why wouldn't someone want to become a
mysterious mercenary and ☆Phantom Thief★
after getting the mystical transformation power to become such a cool mercenary?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Um… Since he began chanting some kind of <FONT color=#a82424>odd spell</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
Whoa! When did you get here?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I came at the request of <FONT color=#a82424>Healer Kanna</FONT>… Are you guys…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
(Vandar's expression becomes ruthless.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Is it really the <FONT color=#a82424>Power of the Star Lord</FONT>?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
How does that make any sense?!

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Hehehehehe, we are quite identical, aren't we?
This coolness, this strength! I really… really like it! Oh my, I'm so beautiful!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. I just… just… had a bad memory…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
Are you… okay?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Anyway, Kanna hired me to take you to her. That's doable, right?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
(Vandar looks worried.)

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
But… I am responsible for fulfilling that girl's wish.
I did my best to retrieve that doll, after all.

$Mercenary Vandar$
We can return the doll later. Come with us for now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(So… his goodwill… did not exactly come naturally.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
But, but, the Star Lord gave me this power to
fulfill the wishes of pitiful boys and girls…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Right, Kanna said she would be in the Streets.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
Don't you realize that the Star Lord has violated my portrait rights?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Maybe I should talk to them it in person. It's part of the mission, after all.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$A Good Place to Watch$
...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Come on. Kanna will be waiting in the Streets.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
Let's just go, okay?

$Healer Kanna$
What is it this time?

$Healer Kanna$
(Stares at Shooting Star for a long time.) This is a result of transformation?
Your freckles are even the same. You sure you two… aren't twins separated at birth or something?

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
No way! No way am I twins with Vandar!
Vandar is…

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
... The Star of Pymon's Mercenaries! The Blade of the Winds! The Gentleman of the Monolith!
The Healer's Protector! The Mad Alpaca Dancer! Cat Dance Virtuoso!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The urge to kill is rising from within.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
Argh!!! Cut it out!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Enough with the fan club! I can't stand it!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
He is the best mercenary ever who combines self-made strength and handsomeness!
He even has a fan club! A fan club!

$Mercenary Vandar$
Shut up! I told you to shut your mouth! Cut it out!
Listen Kanna, this guy has nothing to do with me…
We can't have him running around out there like this! We have to get rid of him, right? Kanna?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(… Is she trying to contain <FONT color=#a82424>laughter</FONT>?!)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
Bwahahaha! Bwahahahahahaha!
Did you hear that Vandar? He said 'fan club'! You have a fan club… Hahahaha!
Just-… Hahaha-... How many people are in that fan club?

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Just one person at the moment, but it's sure to grow.
Along with the fame of the Transformation Thief Shooting Star,
the membership of Vandar's fan club is going to soar!

$Healer Kanna$
(Laughing to the point of tears.)
Okay, great…. Really great.

$Mercenary Vandar$
Right… Uh, Kanna?

$Healer Kanna$
How about you do something to help Vandar out?

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
I'm so pleased you understand my intentions!
That's why I took on Vandar's appearance and became a Phantom Thief who fulfills everyone's wishes!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I fail to see what is so funny.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
No, not that. You need to stop doing that. You're being a nuisance.
Bwaha… You've violated... Bahaha… Vandar's portrait rights… Haha.

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Ah… This is a legal matter... My apologies!
But it was an opportunity granted by cosmic entropy!

$Healer Kanna$
Alright, let's look on the bright side and look at this as an opportunity.
You should compensate Vandar for his portrait rights and help him out.
What do you think about working part-time for our clinic?

$Healer Kanna$
You can do it to pay off the compensation for violating his portrait rights. It's not a hard job.
Hmm, I think wearing that outfit should attract enough eyes.
I'd rather you kindly spread leaflets in his clothing than dance around in his Alpaca suit
.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I'm completely at a loss at this point.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Transformation Thief Shooting Star$
Great! I can't outdo the Cat Dance Virtuoso Vandar,
but if I can shine the starlight of love into everyone's hearts, what more could I ask?

$Healer Kanna$
Now, allow me to give you your first mission.
Can you chant that transformation spell for me?

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star${sound:npc_Vandar_qu3895_sp_01.ogg}
Brilliant Star Lord who illuminates the night sky! Reveal to me that handsome and pretty Star of Pymon's Mercenaries!
The Shining Shooting☆ Star!

$Healer Kanna$
(Applauds)
Excellent! Well done! More, more!

$Transformation Thief Shooting Star${sound:npc_Vandar_qu3895_sp_02.ogg}
Bring the light of love to everyone's hearts!
Shine it down, down, super shining starlight!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(That must be the end. I feel bad for Vandar.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
You passed the test! With flying colors! Well done, Master Shooting Star! Go and begin your first mission.
Hand out all these flyers and I'll buy you a meal!

$Mercenary Vandar$
Kanna, do you think this is at all reasonable?!

$Healer Kanna$
I'll fill you in when we return to the clinic. Okay?
{user_nick}, you can collect your payment at the clinic.

$Healer Kanna$
(Kanna turns and asks Vandar.)
So, what was it you wanted to talk about?

$Mercenary Vandar$
That Shooting Star guy back there.

$Healer Kanna$
Oh, our cute little unpaid part-timer, Master Shooting Star?
You've danced in an alpaca suit more than a few times, so why can't he do that for a while too?
And his face is just perfect. The Star of Pymon's Mercenaries, bwaha...! The Gentleman… of the… Monol-, bahaha…

$Mercenary Vandar$
Please cut it out…

$Healer Kanna$
Well, if you hate the idea so much, do it yourself. That way he won't have to.
Go ahead! You heard him chant that spell, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yeah, I don't really want to see him do that…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu3895_sp_03.ogg}
Why should I have to do it?!

$Mercenary Vandar$
Right? Thank you!

$Healer Kanna$
Um, cosmic… what was it? He really got into it at that point.
Okay, do it just like that and if you pass the test, I'll fire him!

$Mercenary Vandar${sound:npc_Vandar_qu3895_sp_04.ogg}
Radiant what's his name shining through the night… Ugh, help me out here. I can't do it.
I'd rather die, Kanna… Honestly, you're killing me right now!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Well, it seems like you have everything under control here, so I'll get going.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Healer Kanna$
Brilliant Star Lord who illuminates☆ the night sky! Reveal to me that handsome and pretty Star of Pymon's Mercenaries!
The Shining Shooting★Star!
You can't do that much? I guess you're not that desperate, then.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Sorry, but I gotta get out of here.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Mercenary Vandar$
Uh, hello? Can you tell her this isn't right? Please?

$Healer Kanna$
Oh, good job earlier, {user_nick}.
Here's your payment, as promised. Thank you so much.
<html>$Quest Complete$</html>

journal.title: New Information
journal.contents:
The boy is nowhere to be found, but this time a young girl seems to be looking for the impostor. That guy sure does get around quickly. You'll have to talk to the girl to figure out where he might be.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - Young Girl
journal.destination: Talk to the Young Girl on the Streets of Red Lotus Palace
journal.todo_msg: Talk to the Young Girl in the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

journal.title: To the Silver Treasure Vault
journal.contents:
You will have to enter the Silver Treasure Vault to find the Shooting Star… Maybe you can use a back road?
※ Talk to the Young Girl to enter the Silver Treasure Vault.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - Young Girl
journal.destination: (Solo) Leave for the Silver Treasure Vault to find the Shooting Star
journal.todo_msg: Leave for the Silver Treasure Vault to find the Shooting Star.

journal.title: An Encounter At Last
journal.contents:
Upon entering the Silver Treasure Vault, you met the Transformation Thief Shooting Star, who put on... quite the performance. Vandar already found him here, though, and it seems like something is going to happen. You should watch from a good vantage point.
※ Speak with the Young Girl on the Streets of Red Lotus Palace to enter the Silver Treasure Vault.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace (Young Girl) - Silver Treasure Vault (Good Vantage Point)
journal.destination: (Solo) Observe the two from a Good Vantage Point in Silver Treasure Vault
journal.todo_msg: Observe the two from a Good Vantage Point in the Silver Treasure Vault.

journal.title: Mission Complete
journal.contents:
Not a single thing coming from the Transformation Thief Shooting Star's mouth is believable. You should probably come forward and say something at this point.
※ You must speak with the Young Girl on the Streets of Red Lotus Palace to enter the Silver Treasure Vault.
※ You cannot do this quest while in a party.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace (Young Girl) - Silver Treasure Vault (Transformation Thief Shooting Star)
journal.destination: (Solo) Talk to Transformation Thief Shooting Star in the Silver Treasure Vault
journal.todo_msg: Talk to the Transformation Thief Shooting Star in the Silver Treasure Vault.

journal.title: Unexpected Development
journal.contents:
You've seen something you can never unsee, but you'll have to get over it and take the Shooting Star to Kanna now that you've caught him.
※ You must speak with Kanna on the Streets of Red Lotus Palace to continue the quest.

Streets of Red Lotus Palace - Healer Kanna
journal.destination: Talk to Kanna on the Streets of Red Lotus Palace
journal.todo_msg: Take the Shooting Star to Kanna, who came all the way to the Streets of Red Lotus Palace.

journal.title: Pitiful Wretch
journal.contents:
Kanna said she would give you the reward at the clinic, so it seems you will have to go there and finish the discussion to get paid. Having a good will... You are beginning to wonder exactly what that means. Oh, Goddess...

Red Lotus Palace Main Street - Healer Kanna
journal.destination: Talk to Healer Kanna at Red Lotus Palace Main Street
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Healer Kanna at Red Lotus Palace Main Street.
